```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>GENIC PHOTOBOOTH</title>
    <style>
        /* Background Gradient */
        body {
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255, 153, 178, 0.5) 20%, rgba(255, 240, 245, 0.9) 40%, snow 70%);
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            text-align: center;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        /* Container Layout */
        .photo-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }

        /* Video Preview */
        #video {
            border-radius: 12px;
            border: 3px solid black;
            width: 640px;
            height: 400px;
            object-fit: cover;
            box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 4px 8px;
        }

        /* Countdown Timer */
        #countdown {
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: bold;
            background: white;
            color: red;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            border-radius: 12px;
            margin: 20px auto;
            box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 4px 8px;
        }

        /* Right-side photo strip */
        #strip {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .photo {
            width: 150px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            border: 2px solid black;
            object-fit: cover;
            box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 4px 8px;
        }

        /* Start Button */
        .btn-primary {
            background-color: black;
            color: white;
            border: 2px solid black;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 24px;
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: bold;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            background-color: white;
            color: black;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<h1 style="font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold;">GENIC PHOTOBOOTH</h1>

<!-- Countdown Timer -->
<div id="countdown">3</div>

<!-- Video & Photo Strip Container -->
<div class="photo-container">
    <video id="video" autoplay></video>
    <div id="strip"></div>
</div>

<!-- Start Button -->
<button id="start-session" class="btn-primary">Start</button>

<script>
  const startBtn = document.getElementById('start-session');
  const countdownEl = document.getElementById('countdown');
  const video = document.getElementById('video');
  const strip = document.getElementById('strip');

  async function initCamera() {
    try {
      const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ video: { width: 640, height: 400 }, audio: false });
      video.srcObject = stream;
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Error accessing camera:', err);
      alert('Could not access camera. Please allow camera access.');
    }
  }

  function storePhoto(dataUrl) {
    let photos = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('photostripImages')) || [];
    photos.push(dataUrl);
    localStorage.setItem('photostripImages', JSON.stringify(photos));
  }

  function capturePhoto() {
    const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
    const context = canvas.getContext('2d');

    // Set correct aspect ratio and size for photostrip
    canvas.width = 640;  
    canvas.height = 400;

    context.translate(canvas.width, 0);
    context.scale(-1, 1);
    context.drawImage(video, 0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

    const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
    const img = new Image();
    img.className = 'photo';
    img.src = dataUrl;
    strip.appendChild(img);

    storePhoto(dataUrl);
  }

  async function startSession() {
    strip.innerHTML = '';
    localStorage.removeItem('photostripImages');
    startBtn.disabled = true;
    startBtn.innerText = "Shooting in progress";

    const totalShots = 4;
    for (let i = 3; i >= 1; i--) {
      countdownEl.textContent = `${i}`;
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
    }
    countdownEl.textContent = "";

    for (let i = 1; i <= totalShots; i++) {
      capturePhoto();
      if (i === totalShots) { 
        redirectToPhotostrip();
      }
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
    }

    startBtn.innerText = "Start";
    startBtn.disabled = false;
  }

  initCamera();
  startBtn.addEventListener('click', startSession);

  function redirectToPhotostrip() {
    window.location.href = 'photostrip.html';
  }
</script>
```
